events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but the package has not arrived yet. The tracking shows no updates for several days.
The reported issue is identified as a delivery delay based on the customer's description of no recent tracking updates.
The case has been assigned to delivery support team member Sarah to investigate the shipping delay.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order delay. Iâ€™m here to help resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can check the status with the carrier?
Sure, my order number is 789456123 and the shipping address is 123 Elm Street, Springfield, IL. Please check the delay.
We contacted the shipping company and found that the package is delayed due to weather conditions. We expect delivery within three more days.
I understand the delay is weather-related, but I am disappointed as this shipment was a gift and now it might arrive late.
As an apology for the delay, we can offer you a 15% discount on your next purchase. Would you like to accept this compensation?
Thank you for the offer, I appreciate that gesture. I will accept the discount for my future orders.
The delivery delay issue is now noted as resolved with compensation provided. We will monitor until your package arrives safely.
Just checking in to confirm that your order has been delivered. Please let us know if you have any further concerns.
Since there are no further issues reported, your case has been closed. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
